name: serverless-github-api-starter-kit
description: A starter project for accessing the GitHub API using GraphQL through a serverless WebTasks instance.

scripts.wt:create: cd functions && node_modules/.bin/wt init && node_modules/.bin/wt create --name index --prod index.js
scripts.wt:update: cd functions && node_modules/.bin/wt update index index.js

author: Nicholas Adamou
